Work About Contact
Jesse Winton
Personal Project • 2017
Personal poster design for the 2009 Broadway play God of Carnage. A personal favorite, “armed?” is an opening line to the show, and, to me, represents the madness that’s about to unfold. With this design, I took an extremely minimalist approach and inspiration from Saul Bass.

  • Art Direction
